name: Totally Finished Game (Game Jam Version)
description: This game was made by me in 72 hours for the "Mini Jam 65: Abandoned", under the theme of "Abandoned" and the limitation of no screen shake at all. It is a 2d platformer based on the theme, and I think it is quite interesting. This will be my first publicly available game, and first game jam game. This was a lot of fun, and this definitely was a learning experience. Thank you for this experience!
